```{r}
pixar <- image_read("pixar.jpg")
radius <- 0
sigma <- 1
lower_pct <- 10
upper_pct <- 30
geom_string <- paste(
  radius,
  "x",
  sigma,
  "+",
  lower_pct,
  "%+",
  upper_pct,
  ""
)

edges_pixar <- pixar %>% 
  # image_enhance() #%>%
  # image_normalize() #%>%
  image_canny(geometry = geom_string)
  # image_quantize(max = 2, colorspace = "gray", dither = FALSE) %>%
  # image_negate()
edges_pixar
```

```{r}
foo <- edges_pixar %>%
  image_hough_txt(format = "svg") %>% 
  cat()
foo
```
